column9: This restaurant also offers really great pasta and pizza take-out in addition to dining in. Try the lasagna, it is superb!

I had the pasta with mushrooms and meat. It was really good. Asked the personnel if I could have some more after the meal, which wasn't really included, but they were more than happy to give me another portion with some of that fine parmiggano...More

I was there with my boyfriend and other two friends. We had a slice of pizza, that in my opinion was too expensive for its dimension and a soft drink. Generally I can affirm that the service was a bit poor and the ratio quality/price...More

There's some nice restaurants inside Lund's old Markethall, but this is not one of them. 
I got first perplexed when they added a slice of prosciutto cotto to my slice of pizza after it had come out of the oven. That is something that you...More
Du vet vad du får och att du kommer bli mätt. Varken maten eller pizzorna är spektakulära på något vis...More

Fruktansvärt dåligt service och mycket otrevlig personal. Förstörde hela måltiden med tråkig attityd.
